properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT token in ms

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT Refresh token in ms

properties.name: jwt.expired-refresh-token-purging-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for purging expired refresh tokens

properties.name: otp.expiration
properties.description: OTP code expiration time in ms

properties.name: otp.expired-otp-purging-cron
properties.description: Cron expression for purging expired OTP codes

properties.name: attribute-encryptor.algorithm
properties.description: Algorithm used for encrypting attribute values

properties.name: attribute-encryptor.secret
properties.description: Secret used to encrypt attribute values
